name: Yggdrasil: Ashes Of The World Tree
name_original: Yggdrasil: Ashes Of The World Tree
description: In this riveting single player adventure side-scroller, venture through various levels of the Yggdrasil tree. Select your chosen god, and battle through bloodthirsty enemies. On your puzzle-filled, action-packed adventures you'll find elaborate temples and floating platforming sections. With skill and maybe a bit of luck, its up to YOU to save the world tree from its burning demise!
